scripts.release: yarn build && rm -rf release && mkdir -p release && cp -R build classes *.php hovercards.* readme.txt changelog.txt release
scripts.dist: yarn release && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mv release gravatar-enhanced && zip gravatar-enhanced.zip -r gravatar-enhanced && mv gravatar-enhanced release && mv gravatar-enhanced.zip dist
scripts.postinstall: rm -f hovercards.js hovercards.css && ln -s node_modules/@gravatar-com/hovercards/dist/index.umd.js hovercards.js && ln -s node_modules/@gravatar-com/hovercards/dist/style.css hovercards.css
